features: 【Upgrad sealed reservoir】Beyoco dust mop spray made of a new generation of liquid release device,with enhanced responsive trigger, Improved the problem of leakage of other brands of microfiber floor mops after use ,Make floor cleaning easy and simple.

【Premium long handle】Extended pole kitchen mop means don't need leaning over a lot and fatiguing your back. High-quality ABS material and a high-hardness aluminum mop rod make the hand feel more comfortable and last longer.You only need to press the trigger on the handle to get the cold water mist needed to clean the floor.

【360° Rotation head 】 360° rotating washable mop head, reach out every corner of your house, Make cleaning easier. Ideal for eliminating the most stubborn dirt on your wall, windows, living room, ceiling, under furniture and even corners hard to reach. bring you a tidy environment.

【3 Pcs microfiber washable pads 】 Floor mops with sprayer come with 3 washable mop replacement cleaning pads. which can quickly switch to replace your wet or dry mop . the magics of microfibers spray mop pad easy to absorbed the smallest dirt and dust .

【Add your favorite cleaning solution 】Just fill 400ml refillable bottle with water and add 2 small teaspoons of your favorite cleaning solution and you are ready to shine your floors. NOTE: it is normal if there is a small amount of water inside the pipe, Because of our mop was tested with water spray before packaging to ensure that you can use them normally . And if you have any problem, contact us .

【Attention Tips 】①Our mops are all brand new, each spray mop has be spray function tested before sent,a small amount of water may remain in bottle is normal phenomenon.②Please don't fill strong acid,alkali detergent into the bottle of the wet jet mop.Because it may corrode the internal parts of the mop .③Before using thick cleaning solutions, please fully dilute it with water. ④ Please clean the water bottle and spray nozzle of the spray mop after use to keep it clean and protected.
【Note 】Beyoco spray mops are 100% brand new. If the goods you received is used, please find your order ,contact us immediately.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Are you still using a traditional mop? - Needs a lot of water to clean ！ - The floor took a long time to dry once it is mopped ！ - Go back and forth to pour water with a heavy bucket ! Beyoco upgrade powerful spray floor mop makes cleaning easier .

Product Detail Specification : Name：spray mops for floor cleaning Size: 15.94" * 5.7" * 50" Color: Brown Handle Material: Aluminum Mop Head Material : ABS Applicable floor type : Wood /Hardwood/Laminate/ Vinyl/Tile so on Package Includes: 1* Microfiber Spray Mop 2* Extra Microfiber Mop Pads ( 3 Pcs in total)

Soft Mop Corners Don't worry about damaging your furniture. Mop head with soft flexible corners protect the furniture from damage while you clean. Refillable Bottle You can fill it with any cleaning solution you want. Just add 2 small teaspoons of cleaning solution to water in the bottle and you are ready to shine your floors.No more buying expensive chemical solution refills.Capacity: 400ml Microfiber Mop Pads Reusable. Save money .Excellent Water absorption performance.Easily collect dust, hair and debris. Convenient Velcro Design The convenient Velcro design spray mop head makes cleaning the mop easier. When cleaning, you only need to remove the mop pad to rinse or washing machine.

Fine Mist Spray Pull of the trigger the spray floor mop dispenses just the right amount of solution, Finely sprays sufficient amount of mist for a perfect clean .Refillable mop with fan-shaped spray nozzle is designed to spray evenly covering full width of the mop head while other's cylindrical shaped easily to splash around. Flexible Mop Head 360° Rotation mops head help you easy to clean any corner and wall, window. Use As Dry and Wet Mop The microfiber mop pad has excellent water absorption and dust removal, can easily collect dust, hair and debris, and can be used for both dry and wet purposes.Spray mop with 3 pack microfiber washable pads , always have one pads available when other is in a washing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for what it does
reviews.reviewText: Got this for spot jobs in my kitchen. It's great. It's sturdy plastic. It comes with 3 'swiffer' style pads that are of good quality and can be washing machine washed. Track mud into the kitchen, this little puppy slicks that right up. It's not great for super deep cleaning, but for the price point, this is a very handy and welcome addition to my house.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use, refillable, eco-friendly
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this product to reduce my use of costly and un-eco-friendly one-use/disposable cleaning products.I think the quality of this product is pretty good for its price. The only issue I've had with it so far is that I used the white fabric tab to pull off the pad on the first use and it ripped, so one of my pads no longer has a pull-tab. I don't use the pull-tabs to remove the pads anymore-- I just grab the edge of the pad and take it off the mat.The mop is very lightweight, which is great in theory for storage and use but requires more elbow grease to clean the tougher spots since the mop itself doesn't put much pressure on the floor to scrub it. Especially along a wall or corner, I have to put my foot on top of the mop to press it down to scrub harder to clean the tougher spots.The refillable container holds about a cup and a half of liquid, which lasts me about 3 weeks of cleaning my floors once per week in my small apartment (I only have tile in the bathroom and kitchen). I imagine in a house with mostly hard floors, this would only last you one time of cleaning. I fill with a teaspoon of Dr. Bronner's Castille soap and add distilled water to fill.I would not recommend purchasing this if you already have a swiffer wet jet- it is always more eco-friendly to use what you already have and modify it to make it better for the environment. If you have a swiffer wet jet, I would recommend looking for a refillable container that will fit into your wet jet that you can fill with a non-toxic floor cleaner. I personally did not yet own a wet-jet/wet-mop set-up and was using my regular swiffer with a wet pad to wet-mop my floors, so I purchased this product.Overall, I am very happy with this product and its ease of use!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for light cleaning
reviews.reviewText: The product is very good and easy to use. I really like it. My only complaint is that the water compartment is little loose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love how lightweight this mop is. Super easy for every day use.I also love the small water reservoir, I wasted so much cleaning solution with my previous mops because I was constantly filling it too much, and not using all of the water solution.Additionally, I love that it comes with three of the microfiber pads.Previously I always used my Bissell spin mop, however that was more for a heavy duty clean, and this is the exact product that I needed for that easy day-to-day clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great spray mop for the price
reviews.reviewText: This spray mop clearly isn't high-end, but it gets the job done and I love having all of the different pads to change out when one gets too wet or soiled. I have purchased more expensive, brand-name mops in the past and those have broken fairly quickly. This one seems to be holding up well so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Aesthetically? Pleasing. Cute. For the neutral color gworlies.Functionally? Not pleasing. Flimsy. The sprayer does not spray, it spits/spurts (one of those “sp” words lol)It does get the job done BUT if you’re trying to go in and clean some floors, not the best. No leakage (so far), 3 pads, easy assembly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No bucket, no wet mop
reviews.reviewText: I just love this floor cleaner. I really don't want to call it a mop,as the entire product focuses on one thing.......cleaning the floor right the first time. It is not shaped like a conventional mop. It is so easy to use and it is lightweight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cheap and works
reviews.reviewText: No need to get the batter powered mop unless you have a large area to mop. I don’t mind the manual spraying but I can see someone’s hand get tired. You could always. The map comes with 3 pads and they seem like decent quality. My floor is clean and I’m satisfied tha I can use my own cleaner's. I can also clean my laminate flooring without worrying about leaving it too wet. I agree it’s not the sturdiest, but it’s a bargain for a reason and hopefully it lasts for a decent amount of time.
Like it better than any other I have used
Helps for easy cleaning, really like this product
It’s ok , but you have to fall into it to clean because it’s so light
I use it for bathroom cleaning only and it is amazing.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great mop but spray mechanism doesn’t last long
reviews.reviewText: Great mop easy to use, clean well. Unfortunately the sprayer does work well. Mine stopped in a couple of months. Tried vinegar to hot water to unclog the pores but no luck.:(
